title: Idyllic Kashmir Luxury Houseboat with Daily Breakfast, Daily Dinner & Shikhara Boat Ride
description:
Experience the enchanting beauty of Kashmir with a luxurious stay in the WelcomHeritage Gurkha Houseboats, moored in the tranquil waters of the famous Nageen Lake. Cradled in the lap of the snow-capped Pir Panjal mountains, the ornate houseboat exudes a romantic charm with its intricate Kashmiri cedar woodwork. The family-run accommodation is the epitome of Kashmiri hospitality, boasting lavishly designed rooms and suites, adorned with handwoven carpets. Savour myriad regional delicacies at the restaurant, lounge on the houseboat's balcony, sip on a cup of saffron kahwah, watch shikhara boats drift by on the lake and immerse yourself in the picturesque beauty of the Srinagar valley.

Popularly known as 'Heaven on Earth', Kashmir is a paradisaical wonder with many sights to behold. Explore the Mughal gardens of Nishat Bagh and Shalimar Bagh, embark on a shikhara ride on the Dal Lake at sunset or post a letter from the world's only floating post office.
offer_address: Opp Nageen Club Nageen Lake, Srinagar Jammu and Kashmir 190006
